page.title: 03Farmland
page.content: There are two main kinds of farm_arable and stock. However, many of these are mixed farms. A third type of farm is a small_holding. This is a small farm of not more than 13 to 14 acres, and the small_holder works with the Forestry Commission. The crops grown on normal{arable farms are wheat and barley (Spring and Winter), potatoes and turnips (tatties and neeps). Oilseed Rape is a fairly new crop,but most farmers grow it because it is a high yield crop and because of the E.E.C subsidy. The seed is round and black and is planted in August. It grows quite quickly and a year later it is ready to be harvested. Small pods grow containg small seeds which,if crushed,produce oil. The oil is used for cooking oil,margarine, salad cream and soap.
